greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: For odd n: a(n) = 0, and for even n: a(n) = -mu(n), where mu is Moebius function (A008683).
comment: Sum of Möbius function values computed for terms of 3x+1 trajectory started at n, but excluding mu(n) itself. See _Marc LeBrun_'s comment in A087003.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
program: A006370(n) = if(n%2, 3*n+1, n/2); \\ This function from _Michael B. Porter_, May 29 2010
xref: Cf. A000035, A006370, A008683, A014682, A039956 (positions of nonzero terms), A087003.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 14 2017
